qas.question: Do i need to install any apps when visiting jordan?

answers.text: Passengers arriving will need to install Aman.jo application on their mobile device

qas.question: Do i need to fill any forms to fly to jordan?

answers.text: complete passenger "http://carc.jo/images/COVID19/Declaration-Form.pdf" health declaration and locator forms

paragraphs.context: The Government have announced that on arrival in Jordan you will need to provide your contact details, travel information and complete passenger "http://carc.jo/images/COVID19/Declaration-Form.pdf" health declaration and locator forms. Passengers will be asked to fill out these forms by their chosen airlines. Passengers arriving will need to install Aman.jo application on their mobile device.
